data.trans: Không đời nào ... như là... (+ so sánh ngang bằng)
data.trans_hint: Người dân bây giờ không đời nào nghèo như cách đây 20 năm về trước.
data.en_hint: The inhabitants are nowhere near as poor as they used to 20 years ago.
data.content_game_1: The inhabitants are nowhere near as poor as they used to 20 years ago.
data.answer_en_hint: The inhabitants are nowhere near as poor as they used to 20 years ago.

data.trans: Không hẳn là ... (+ so sánh ngang bằng)
data.trans_hint: Cơ sở vật chất ở thành phố này không hẳn là bất tiện hơn so với các thành phố khác.
data.en_hint: The facilities in this city are not quite as inconvenient as those in other places.
data.content_game_1: The facilities in this city are not quite as inconvenient as those in other places.
data.answer_en_hint: The facilities in this city are not quite as inconvenient as those in other places.

data.trans: Hầu như không ... (+ so sánh ngang bằng)
data.trans_hint: Chi phí sinh hoạt của vùng này hầu như không đắt so với các vùng khác.
data.en_hint: The cost of living in this area is not nearly as expensive as that of other areas.
data.content_game_1: The cost of living in this area is not nearly as expensive as that of other areas.
data.answer_en_hint: The cost of living in this area is not nearly as expensive as that of other areas.

data.trans: Gần như ngang ngửa (+ so sánh ngang bằng)
data.trans_hint: Học phí ở đây gần như đắt ngang ngửa học phí ở những trường khác trong khu vực.
data.en_hint: The school fee here is almost as expensive as that of other prestigious schools in the area.
data.content_game_1: The school fee here is almost as expensive as that of other prestigious schools in the area.
data.answer_en_hint: The school fee here is almost as expensive as that of other prestigious schools in the area.

data.trans_hint: Giá cả ở Anh cao so với Úc vì mức sống cao hơn.
data.en_hint: Prices in the UK are high compared to Australia as the standard of living is higher.
data.content_game_1: Prices in the UK are high compared to Australia as the standard of living is higher.
data.answer_en_hint: Prices in the UK are high compared to Australia as the standard of living is higher.

data.trans_hint: Giáo viên nữ chiếm hơn 90 phần trăm trong lĩnh vực dạy tiểu học ngược lại các đồng nghiệp nam chỉ chiếm 10 phần trăm.
data.en_hint: Female teachers accounted for over 90 percent of the teaching staff at elementary schools as opposed to only 10 percent male counterparts.
data.content_game_1: Female teachers accounted for over 90 percent of the teaching staff at elementary schools as opposed to only 10 percent male counterparts.
data.answer_en_hint: Female teachers accounted for over 90 percent of the teaching staff at elementary schools as opposed to only 10 percent male counterparts.

data.trans_hint: Hàng trăm khách du lịch tới thăm các viện bảo tàng trong thành phố mỗi ngày, trái lại có rất ít dân địa phương đến đây vì họ đã cảm thấy quá quen thuộc rồi.
data.en_hint: Hundreds of foreign visitors are visit museums on a daily basis. In contrast, very few local residents go to those places as they find those too familiar.
data.content_game_1: Hundreds of foreign visitors are visit museums on a daily basis. in contrast, very few local residents go to those places as they find those too familiar.
data.answer_en_hint: Hundreds of foreign visitors are visit museums on a daily basis. in contrast, very few local residents go to those places as they find those too familiar.

data.trans: Đứng thứ nhất (+ so sánh hơn nhất)
data.trans_hint: Thái Lan là quốc gia đứng thứ nhất về xuất khẩu gạo trong khu vực.
data.en_hint: Thailand is by far the most leading country in rice export in the area.
data.content_game_1: Thailand is by far the most leading country in rice export in the area.
data.answer_en_hint: Thailand is by far the most leading country in rice export in the area.

data.trans: Nhiều gấp đôi (với danh từ không đếm được)
data.trans_hint: Người dân vùng này có thu nhập cao gấp đôi so với người dân ở các vùng khác.
data.en_hint: The inhabitants in this region earn incomes twice as much as people in other regions.
data.content_game_1: The inhabitants in this region earn incomes twice as much as people in other regions.
data.answer_en_hint: The inhabitants in this region earn incomes twice as much as people in other regions.
